Name: ON-Harmony: A resource for development and comparison of multi-modal brain 3T MRI harmonisation approaches
HowToAcknowledge: Please cite this paper: Warrington, et al. (2025), A multi-site, multi-modal travelling-heads resource for brain MRI harmonisation, Scientific Data
EthicsApprovals: For phase B, all data have been acquired under University of Nottingham Research ethics FMHS-452-0122 (S.N.S. PI), also approved by University of Oxford Medical Sciences Research Ethics Committee (R79669/RE001).
For phase A, Nottingham data: FMHS-36-1220-03 and H14082014/47. Oxford data: technical development approved by the Oxford University Clinical Trials and Research Governance office.
